setup.title: Click to Set Directory
setup.description: To manage your video editing projects, please select a local folder as the project workspace. All project files will be saved in this folder.

error.unsupported: The current browser does not support local file access functionality. Please use Chrome, Edge, or other modern browsers that support the File System Access API.
error.permission: Workspace directory permission is lost or the directory does not exist. Please select a workspace directory again.
